metaTags.metaDescription: Join us here for our updates and announcements for exciting updates during Security Week.

relatedBlades.title: Security Week 2025
relatedBlades.copy: During this year's Security Week, we are boosting security with AI-driven insights, better threat detection, and stronger protections against emerging risks. Our aim is to empower customers with more intuitive and user-friendly solutions to protect their data and applications in an increasingly complex environment.

imageAssetFile.altText: Security Week 2025 Hero image

contentfulAsset.description: Security Week 2025 Hero image

features.title: Welcome to Security Week 2025
features.description: Cloudflare's Chief Security Officer introduces 2025 Security Week by sharing insights into latest trends in cyber security and showcasing the latest in Cloudflare technology.

imageAssetFile.altText: Security Week 2025 Hero image

contentfulAsset.description: Security Week 2025 Hero image

features.title: Conventional cryptography is under threat. Upgrade to post-quantum cryptography with Cloudflare Zero Trust
features.description: Protect your corporate network from quantum threats by tunneling it through Cloudflare's Zero Trust platform, and let us handle the upgrade to post-quantum cryptography for you.

imageAssetFile.altText: Conventional cryptography is under threat. Upgrade to post-quantum cryptography with Cloudflare Zero Trust.

contentfulAsset.description: Conventional cryptography is under threat. Upgrade to post-quantum cryptography with Cloudflare Zero Trust.

features.title: Email security now available for free for political parties and campaigns through Cloudflare for campaigns
features.description: Cloudflare for campaigns now includes email security, adding an extra layer of protection to email systems that power political campaigns.

imageAssetFile.altText: Email Security now available for free for political parties and campaigns through Cloudflare for Campaigns

contentfulAsset.description: Email Security now available for free for political parties and campaigns through Cloudflare for Campaigns

features.title: How Cloudflare is using automation to tackle phishing head on
features.description: Learn more about how Cloudflare is using threat intelligence and our Developer Platform products to automate phishing abuse reports.

imageAssetFile.altText: How Cloudflare is using automation to tackle phishing head on

contentfulAsset.description: How Cloudflare is using automation to tackle phishing head on

features.title: Password reuse is rampant: nearly half of observed user logins are compromised
features.description: Nearly half of login attempts on websites protected by Cloudflare involve leaked credentials, with password reuse fueling widespread bot attacks and account takeovers.

imageAssetFile.altText: Password reuse is rampant: nearly half of observed user logins are compromised

contentfulAsset.description: Password reuse is rampant: nearly half of observed user logins are compromised

features.title: Advancing account security as part of Cloudflare's commitment to CISA's Secure by Design pledge
features.description: A year after signing CISA's Secure by Design pledge, Cloudflare has boosted MFA adoption with new Apple and Google social login options for easier, more secure access.

imageAssetFile.altText: Advancing account security as part of Cloudflare's commitment to CISA's Secure by Design pledge

contentfulAsset.description: Advancing account security as part of Cloudflare's commitment to CISA's Secure by Design pledge

features.title: Enhanced security and simplified controls with automated botnet protection, cipher suite selection, and URL Scanner updates
features.description: Enhanced security, simplified control! This Security Week, Cloudflare unveils automated botnet protection, flexible cipher suites, and an upgraded URL Scanner.

imageAssetFile.altText: Enhanced security and simplified controls with automated botnet protection, flexible cipher suites, and URL Scanner updates

contentfulAsset.description: Enhanced security and simplified controls with automated botnet protection, flexible cipher suites, and URL Scanner updates

features.title: Unleashing improved context for threat actor activity with our threat events platform
features.description: Explore Cloudflare's new threat events platform for real-time insights and actionable intelligence to stay ahead of cyber threats and protect critical assets.

imageAssetFile.altText: Unleashing improved context for threat actor activity with our threat events platform

contentfulAsset.description: Unleashing improved context for threat actor activity with our threat events platform

features.title: Cloudflare enables native monitoring and forensics with Log Explorer and custom dashboards
features.description: Cloudflare Log Explorer now supports Zero Trust datasets and custom dashboards, enabling native monitoring of suspicious activity.

imageAssetFile.altText: Monitoring and forensics natively within Cloudflare

contentfulAsset.description: Monitoring and forensics natively within Cloudflare

features.title: Manage your company's security posture with Cloudflare Security Insights
features.description: Cloudflare introduces a unified security platform for managing security posture across SaaS and web apps in any environment.

features.title: New Turnstile analytics enable deeper insights, faster investigations, and improved security
features.description: Introducing Turnstile analytics: Gain insights into visitor traffic, bot behavior, traffic anomalies, and challenge outcomes to stay ahead of evolving attacks.

imageAssetFile.altText: New Turnstile Analytics enable deeper insights, faster investigations, and improved security

contentfulAsset.description: New Turnstile Analytics enable deeper insights, faster investigations, and improved security

features.title: Cloudflare for AI: supporting AI adoption at scale with a security-first approach
features.description: With Cloudflare for AI, developers, security teams, and content creators can harness Cloudflare's network and tools to secure, monitor, and enhance the resilience of AI applications.

imageAssetFile.altText: Cloudflare for AI: supporting AI adoption at scale with a security-first approach

contentfulAsset.description: Cloudflare for AI: supporting AI adoption at scale with a security-first approach

features.title: AI Labyrinth: trapping bots with AI generated content
features.description: Learn how Cloudflare uses generative AI to slow down, confuse, and waste resources of AI Crawlers and other bots that ignore no-crawl directives.

imageAssetFile.altText: AI Labyrinth: fighting bots with AI generated content

contentfulAsset.description: AI Labyrinth: fighting bots with AI generated content

features.title: An early look at cryptographic watermarks for AI-generated content
features.description: As AI-generated content becomes harder to distinguish from human-created content, we explore a promising approach to make AI content identifiable without compromising model performance.

imageAssetFile.altText: An early look at cryptographic watermarks for AI-generated content

contentfulAsset.description: An early look at cryptographic watermarks for AI-generated content

features.title: Automatically protect your public Generative AI applications with Cloudflare's Firewall for AI
features.description: Firewall for AI protects LLM-powered applications, and integrates seamlessly with Cloudflare WAF. Join the beta now to take control of your Gen AI security.

imageAssetFile.altText: Automatically protect your public Generative AI applications with Cloudflare's Firewall for AI

contentfulAsset.description: Automatically protect your public Generative AI applications with Cloudflare's Firewall for AI

features.title: How we train AI to uncover malicious JavaScript intent and make web surfing safer
features.description: Discover how Cloudflare developed an AI model using a Graph Neural Network to detect malicious JavaScript intent, from data pre-processing to large-scale inferencing, as part of our Page Shield offering to enhance web security.

imageAssetFile.altText: How we train AI to uncover malicious JavaScript intent and make web surfing safer

contentfulAsset.description: How we train AI to uncover malicious JavaScript intent and make web surfing safer

features.title: Improving Bot Management flexibility and visibility with new high-precision heuristics
features.description: The new Heuristics framework in Cloudflare's Ruleset Engine offers flexible rule writing, rapid updates, and enhanced control and explainability for Bot Management customers.

imageAssetFile.altText: Improving Bot Management flexibility and visibility with new high-precision heuristics

contentfulAsset.description: Improving Bot Management flexibility and visibility with new high-precision heuristics

features.title: Introducing Cloudy, Cloudflare's AI agent for simplifying complex configurations
features.description: Meet Cloudflare's first AI agent, Cloudy! It simplifies complex configurations, making them simpler and more accessible for administrators to understand and manage.

imageAssetFile.altText: Cloudflare AI Agent Story

contentfulAsset.description: Cloudflare AI Agent Story

features.title: Introducing a new Application Security experience
features.description: We're introducing a new Application Security experience with a reworked UI, organized by use cases, making it easier for customers to navigate and secure their accounts, APIs, and more.

imageAssetFile.altText: Introducing a new Application Security experience

contentfulAsset.description: Introducing a new Application Security experience

features.title: Cloudflare Access now supports private hostname & IP address-defined applications and reusable access policies
features.description: We're introducing support for private hostname/IP-defined applications and reusable access policies, boosting Access's protection and making policy management easier for admins.

imageAssetFile.altText: Cloudflare Access now supports private hostname & IP address-defined applications and reusable access policies

contentfulAsset.description: Cloudflare Access now supports private hostname & IP address-defined applications and reusable access policies

features.title: HTTPS-only for Cloudflare APIs: shutting the door on cleartext traffic
features.description: We're closing cleartext HTTP ports for Cloudflare API traffic to prevent the unintentional leakage of secret API keys before connections are rejected on the server side, enhancing security.

imageAssetFile.altText: HTTPS-only for Cloudflare APIs: shutting the door on cleartext traffic

contentfulAsset.description: HTTPS-only for Cloudflare APIs: shutting the door on cleartext traffic

features.title: Lock down origin access with Cloudflare Aegis
features.description: Cloudflare Aegis provides dedicated egress IPs for Zero Trust strategies and improved observability, giving customers visibility into egress traffic for compliance with data residency and access control regulations.

imageAssetFile.altText: Lock down origin access with Cloudflare Aegis

contentfulAsset.description: Lock down origin access with Cloudflare Aegis

features.title: Cloudflare named a leader in Web Application Firewall Solutions in 2025 Forrester report
features.description: Forrester Research has recognized Cloudflare as a Leader in its latest report, The Forrester Waveâ„¢: Web Application Firewall Solutions, Q1 2025.

imageAssetFile.altText: Cloudflare remains a leader in Web Application Firewall Solutions in latest Forrester report

contentfulAsset.description: Cloudflare remains a leader in Web Application Firewall Solutions in latest Forrester report

features.title: Getting a grip on sensitive data proliferation in AWS and GCP
features.description: Cloudflare CASB now allows you to scan cloud storage for sensitive data at-rest, helping prevent data exfiltration and ensuring compliance.

imageAssetFile.altText: Getting a grip on sensitive data proliferation in AWS and GCP

contentfulAsset.description: Getting a grip on sensitive data proliferation in AWS and GCP

features.title: RDP without the risk: Cloudflare's browser-based solution for secure third-party access
features.description: Cloudflare now offers clientless, browser-based support for Remote Desktop Protocol (RDP), providing secure, remote Windows server access without the need for VPNs or RDP clients.

imageAssetFile.altText: RDP without the risk: Cloudflare's browser-based solution for secure contractor access

contentfulAsset.description: RDP without the risk: Cloudflare's browser-based solution for secure contractor access

features.title: Improving Data Loss Prevention accuracy with AI context analysis
features.description: Cloudflare's Data Loss Prevention reduces false positives by using AI context analysis on the Developer Platform, improving detection accuracy with a self-improving, AI-powered algorithm.

features.title: Enhanced data protection in Microsoft Outlook with DLP Assist
features.description: Customers can now easily safeguard sensitive data in Microsoft Outlook with Cloudflare's new DLP Assist feature.

imageAssetFile.altText: Enhance data protection in Microsoft Outlook with Cloudflare One's new DLP Assist

contentfulAsset.description: Enhance data protection in Microsoft Outlook with Cloudflare One's new DLP Assist

features.title: Prepping for post-quantum: a beginner's guide to lattice cryptography
features.description: This beginner's guide to lattices explores the math behind post-quantum (PQ) cryptography, offering a step-by-step explanation of lattice-based encryption and authentication from scratch.

imageAssetFile.altText: Prepping for post-quantum: a beginner's guide to lattice cryptography

contentfulAsset.description: Prepping for post-quantum: a beginner's guide to lattice cryptography

features.title: Cloudflare is now IRAP assessed at the PROTECTED level, furthering our commitment to the global public sector
features.description: Cloudflare is now assessed at the IRAP PROTECTED level, bringing our products and services to the Australian Public Sector.

imageAssetFile.altText: Cloudflare is now IRAP assessed at the PROTECTED level, furthering our commitment to the global public sector

contentfulAsset.description: Cloudflare is now IRAP assessed at the PROTECTED level, furthering our commitment to the global public sector

features.title: Security Week 2025: In Review
features.description: Security Week 2025 has officially come to a close. Our updates for the week included a deep dive on our AI offering, a unified navigation experience, and an introduction to our AI Agent Cloudy. Read about the latest updates from the team and discover how Cloudflare is helping build a better Internet.

imageAssetFile.altText: Security Week 2025: Wrap up post

contentfulAsset.description: Security Week 2025: Wrap up post
